title: Integrated Stress Management Program for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of stress concepts and nursing task experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based education for general citizens, conducted in VR environments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize stress factors in various nursing situations with 80% accuracy
Learners can select three or more appropriate coping strategies for stress scenarios presented in VR simulations
Learners can justify their stress-coping strategy selections with validity recognized by at least 70% of participants
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
